ygData.subject: Re: Happenings Elsewhere
ygData.msgSnippet: A few cycles later, Lio Convoy sits at a elongated table within the Chamber of Elders in Iacon City, the Cybertron capital. Elder 1: So what is the situation,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

A few cycles later, Lio Convoy sits at a elongated table within the Chamber of Elders in Iacon City, the Cybertron capital.

Elder 1: So what is the situation, Lio Convoy?

Lio Convoy: Earth is under full scale assualt by the Decepticon force that we discovered on the far side of the galaxy, months ago.

Elder 2: The next generation Decepticon Empire?

Lio Convoy: Correct.

Elder 2: Then we must send aid to Earth.

Big Convoy: Agreed. I have assembled a large Maximal force that will report to Earth and fight of the Decepticon invasion.

Lio Convoy: I'll lead that force to Earth.

Big Convoy: Sir, that isn't a good idea. Our military commander should remain on Cybertron to organize efforts.

Lio Convoy: Cybertron isn't an issue right now. With the exception of the renogade Megatron II and his terrorist cell, there has been no inter-Transformer conflict in centuries.

Elder 1: What of the Neo Beast Wars on the Past-Earth colonies?

Lio Convoy: With all do respect, Elder, the Past-Earth colonies have established their own communities and governments. They essentially have no bearing on true Cybertronian politics. I will lead the aid force to Earth. Big Convoy can take command of the Maximal military on Cybertron.

Big Convoy: With the size of the force I assembled to go to Earth and the majority of our star fleet on deep space assignments, Cybertron's defense will be crippled.

Lio Convoy: Like I said, Cybertron isn't an issue right now. We are at peace here. The trouble is Earth.

Elder 3: Do we have you're word on that Supreme Commander/

Lio Convoy: You do, Elders.

******

Days later the massive Maximal force leaves Cybertron for Earth, prepared for a long and brutal conflict with the Generation 2 Decepticons.

TO BE CONTINUED.....

Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:                                  OOC: I hope noone minds this new side story arc I'm trying. I just want to get something interesting happening, even if it's not directly in the RPGs setting. Just an interesting read I hope. This is what happens when I've been reading through my TF comics and getting creative.

IC:

The alarms on every computer in the military headquarters of the Maximal Imperium all sound off at once. Heroic Maximals are dashing everywhere, trying to figure out what is going on.

One such bot is getting a handle on things. He turns to his superior.

Maximal 1: Lt. Hounder, this is very odd. My readouts tell me that every warp-gate near the Terran system has been re-activated after centuries...

Lt. Hounder: Those warp-gates were all ordered permanently shut down by Optimus Prime after the Pax Cybertronia. Only a select few very close to Earth were left online, under the control of the Earth Defense Command.

Maximal 1: I'm aware of that, sir, but the  readouts say otherwise.

Lt. Hounder: Can you tell me what's transporting through those warp-gates?

Maximal 1: I've been scanning. I should have something for you in a few moments.

Lt. Hounder: As quick as possible, soldier. We must no if Earth is in danger. Earth has been on it's own for centuries now and hasn't been threatened. We don't even know if the EDC still exists. They might now be able to handle a planetary attack. We... The Maximal Imperium would have to respond.

Maximal 1: Signatures are clearing, sir. I... I don't believe this. It can't...

Lt. Hounder: What is is?!

Maximal 1: Decepticons, sir. DECEPTICONS!

Lt. Hounder: Impossible...

Maximal 1: Lots of them. Earth is under assualt by an entire Decepticon task force. I'm reading hundreds of them!

Lt. Hounder: We can't wait any longer. Get me a direct channel to Iacon City. The Chamber of Elders!

Maximal 1: Aye, sir.

As the Maximal starts  to press some controls to follow his order a commanding voice rockets through the room:

Commanding Voice: Belay that order!

A tall bot walks over and shuts down the computer system.

Lt. Hounder: Supreme Commander Lio Convoy! How can we not tell the council?

Lio Convoy: The Council of Elders is already aware of what they need to be aware of. That includes what is comiing through those warp-gates. You two...

Lio Convoy removes any material that contains knowledge of what has happened.

Lio Convoy: You two are to forget that this day ever happened. That is a direct order.

Lio Convoy walks out of the control room.

TO BE CONTINUED...

         

---------------------------------
Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
